entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow not displaying properly in Border #13944
  • Pivot control like in UWP / WinUI3? #13943
  • Directly executing the Run command on the .NET MAUI App on the Windows platform in .NET 8 Preview 2 ends up in an error #13942
  • HorizontalOptions squish a button #13941
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Expand/improve the .Net MAUI API for file selection/writing/reading #13939
  • MacCatalyst WebView keydown events are not captured #13934
  • Dark mode issue: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException upon "await Shell.Current.GoToAsync()" #13932
  • [MAC] Application crashes when interacting with Entry control #13931
  • Finalize templates for .NET 8 #13929
    .NET 8 Planning
  • CollectionView on windows no longer resizes width when resizing window #13924
  • Entry Return command not firing up - .NET MAUI MVVM on Android #13921
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui UI issues on release apk (Text disappear on buttons) #13919
  • VS 2022 17.5 DEP0700 on Windows - "BaseSize="128,128"" is now required on MauiSplashScreen in csproj #13918
  • Upgrading to Visual Studio 17.5 broke MAUI Windows Slider #13917
    Backlog
  • :NET MAUI displays a list wrong on IOS, when the app was shortly in the background #13916
    Backlog
  • Maui Mac Catalyst - Button BackgroundColor ignored #13915
  • Can't set MAUI iOS Navigation Icon after updating to 17.6 Preview 1 #13914
  • Image sizing does not work correctly #13913
  • Images loaded into CollectionView items via ImageSource.FromResource at runtime are not visible and break the layout #13904
  • Hot Reload (and C# code updates) doesn't update Children of ListView on WinUI #13900
  • Error compiling 8.0 preview 1 #13897

Closed

  • TextColor of RadioButton seems to be always black for Mac Catalyst, despite setting it in constructor with e.g. new RadioButton { TextColor = Color.FromRgb(255, 0, 0), ... } #6430
    Backlog
  • VisualStates for RadioButton not working #12805
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Shell ShellContent IsVisible Error #13922
  • Info.plist for MacCatalyst apps prevents upload to the App Store #13910
    Backlog
  • Unit test projects can't reference Maui multi target projects #3552
    8.0-preview2
  • Focusing an Entry control fails to open the soft keyboard when targeting net7.0-android #13909
  • XamlC error XFC0000 when building migrated MAUI app in VS #13912
  • Entry Focus is not cleared in Android #13928
  • [iOS] Spacing between `Header` and `FlyoutItems` on iOS only #11679
    8.0-preview2
  • iOS simulator Accelerometer Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.FeatureNotSupportedException #13889
  • Make Contribution User Story Better #7596
  • Running dotnet new mauilib produces a warning 'The post action 84c0da21-51c8-4541-9940-6ca19af04ee6 is not supported' #4994
    Backlog
  • Adding rows and columns programmatically in .NET MAUI Grid Types does not work #13923
  • .Net Maui UI issues on release apk (Text disappear on buttons) #13920
  • RadioButton has a weird dark background #5931
    Backlog
  • Unable to build in Release #13676
  • Migration documentation enhancement suggestion #7446
  • Documentation how to release macOS catalyst apps on App Store #12455
    Backlog
  • Entry show without Underline or Bottom line in MAUI GA #7487
    Backlog
  • Equivalent of WPF Style.Resources? #7364
  • .Net Maui Multiple Listview errors and program crash on VS2022 (64-bit) Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #7276
  • .NET MAUI source view showing errors - lots of them! #7279
  • [Mac] MAUI Project doesn't build with classlib referenced #7163
  • WebView Navigation Bar disappears and flickers in landscape mode #7100
  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor project template name to include "Blazor Hybrid" #13804
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged event only raises once #8236
    Backlog
  • Ping in iOS #6187
    Backlog
  • The prompts displayed by DisplayAlert do not follow the theme set #6092
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Workload installation failed on macOS / arm64 #5926
    Backlog
  • Installing MAUI with dotnet installed with brew fails #5939
    Backlog
  • Info.plist editor mixes line endings #5597
    Backlog
  • .net maui builder. Services (Quartz Service won't start) #4028
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI CodeGen #3679
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Missing Add method for AbsoluteLayout that takes 3 args #3094
    Backlog
  • [Bug] RangeSlider (XCT compat renderer) is not shown using Grid #2696
    Backlog
  • Button with shadow style does not appear if it is "IsVisible = false" initially #11427
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump version of `AndroidX.Security.SecurityCrypto` to 1.1.0-alpha05 #13938
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
  • Only fail aar task in CI or when set as target #13935
  • Add an error if Xamarin.Forms was found #13933
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13908
    area/controls 🎮, keyboard
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #13907
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Move Android Initialize call to Mappers #13879
  • Remove unsupported UIDeviceFamily for Mac Catalyst #13911
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/templates 📄
  • [Actions] DO not double quote a already quoted string. #13926
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Add HostIdentifier for mauilib template to prevent warning during creation #13903
    area/templates 📄
  • [Actions] Message does not need quotes since it is already quoted. #13925
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fabricbot: remove "try latest version" label from issue when author responds #13906
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 #13792
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Actions] Do not execute the ping for all branches. #13892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Security.SecurityCrypto from 1.1.0-alpha03 to 1.1.0-alpha05 #13867
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13873
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Actions] Ensure that strings are valid in json. #13890
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Ensure WrapperView children become visible when it does #13894
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #13875
  • The MapPage in the sandbox is not needed #13880
  • Revert "Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#12890)" #13874
    area/controls 🎮
  • Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖, area/theme

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Ensure an exact measure for the nested horizontal scrollview #13554
    area/layout 🔲
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Create development path without compatibility projects #13660
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13888
    area/setup 🪄
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
  • [Windows] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled on Windows SearchBar #13636
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, area/theme
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix issue updating the Path Data #13816
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
